column5: I did this over social media and it’s the worst thing ever. I went off on others (husbands friends) while mad and shared way too much. Now they think I’m a lunatic. I apologized but nothing has ever been the same. Had to deactivate all my apps and all I want to do is just hide
I’ve been recently diagnosed and this definitely resonates with me. It’s hard because I don’t even remember who I was before all of it.
